SEARCH
Package examblock.model

Class RegistryImpl

Object
RegistryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Registry
public class RegistryImpl extends Object implements Registry
Implementation of the Registry interface, managing shared instances of ManageableListItem objects (e.g., Exam, Subject). Stores items in a map for fast lookup by ID and a list of IDs for ordering. Ensures uniqueness by throwing an exception for duplicate IDs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    RegistryImpl()
    Constructs a new, empty registry.

    • contains

      public <T extends ManageableListItem> boolean contains(String id, Class<T> type)
      Checks if an item with the given ID exists for the specified type.
      Specified by:
      contains in interface Registry
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the item, extending ManageableListItem
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier to check
      type - the class of the item
      Returns:
      true if an item with the ID exists, false otherwise

    • add

      public <T extends ManageableListItem> void add(T item, Class<T> type)
      Adds an item to the registry for the specified type, storing it by its ManageableListItem.getId() and appending its ID to the ordered list. If the item is already registered (same ID and instance), it is not re-added.
      Specified by:
      add in interface Registry
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the item, extending ManageableListItem
      Parameters:
      item - the item to add
      type - the class of the item
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a different item with the same ID exists
      NullPointerException - if the item's ID is null

    • get

      public <T extends ManageableListItem> T get(String id, Class<T> type) throws RuntimeException
      Finds an item by its unique ID for the specified type. Unlike find(), get will throw a RuntimeException if the item is not found
      Specified by:
      get in interface Registry
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the item, extending ManageableListItem
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the item
      type - the class of the item
      Returns:
      the item if found, or throw new RuntimeException if not found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

      public <T extends ManageableListItem> void removeAll(Class<T> type)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      type - the class of the items to remove

    • getAll

      public <T extends ManageableListItem> List<T> getAll(Class<T> type)
      Returns a synthesized list of all items for the specified type, in the order defined by the stored IDs. The returned list is a new instance, so modifying it does not affect the registry.
      Specified by:
      getAll in interface Registry
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the items, extending ManageableListItem
      Parameters:
      type - the class of the items
      Returns:
      a new list containing all items of the specified type

    • getAt

      public <T extends ManageableListItem> T getAt(int row, Class<T> type)
      Retrieves an item at the specified index in the ordered list for the given type.
      Specified by:
      getAt in interface Registry
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the item, extending ManageableListItem
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the item (0-based)
      type - the class of the item
      Returns:
      the item at the index, or null if the index is invalid
